statements: UPDATE IoT_Sensor_Data SET sensor_name='Temperature Sensor', network_traffic=1500 WHERE sensor_id=1;
UPDATE IoT_Sensor_Data SET data_timestamp=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, network_traffic=2000 WHERE sensor_id=2;
UPDATE IoT_Sensor_Data SET sensor_name='Temperature Sensor', network_traffic=500 WHERE sensor_id=1;
UPDATE IoT_Sensor_Data SET data_timestamp='2022-01-15 08:30:00', sensor_name='Pressure Sensor', network_traffic=300 WHERE sensor_id=2;
UPDATE network_traffic_data SET sensor_name = 'Sensor1', timestamp = '2022-01-01' WHERE sensor_id = 1;
UPDATE sensor_metadata SET sensor_type = 'Temperature', last_calibration = '2022-03-15' WHERE sensor_id = 2;
UPDATE network_traffic_data SET sensor_name = 'Sensor1', timestamp = '2022-09-15 08:30:00', traffic_data = '{"status":"normal", "speed":50}' WHERE sensor_id = 1;
UPDATE sensor_metadata SET sensor_model = 'ModelX', install_location = 'Building A', last_calibration = '2022-05-10' WHERE sensor_id = 2;
UPDATE NetworkTrafficSensors SET sensor_location = 'New York' WHERE sensor_id = 1;
UPDATE SensorStatus SET status_code = 200, status_message = 'OK' WHERE sensor_id = 2;
UPDATE NetworkTrafficSensors SET sensor_location = 'Main Street', sensor_type = 'Traffic Monitoring' WHERE sensor_id = 1
UPDATE SensorData SET data_value = 25.5, data_timestamp = '2022-03-15 10:30:00' WHERE sensor_id = 2
UPDATE network_traffic_sensors SET sensor_type = 'Temperature' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sensor_readings SET value = 25.5 WHERE sensor_id = 2;
UPDATE network_traffic_sensors SET location = 'New York' WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature Sensor';
UPDATE sensor_readings SET value = 25.5 WHERE sensor_id = 200 AND timestamp > '2022-01-01';
UPDATE network_traffic_sensor_data SET data_value = 25.5 WHERE id = 'abc-123-def-456';
UPDATE sensor_metadata SET location = 'Server Room 1', status = false WHERE sensor_id = 12345;
UPDATE network_traffic_sensor_data SET sensor_id = 101, data_value = 15.6 WHERE id = '5c3b571d-8aca-4918-8e93-61aa160a1805';
UPDATE sensor_metadata SET location = 'Main Entrance', status = true WHERE sensor_id = 201;
